channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Snap breaks into ‘startup squads’ as ad revenue stalls
item.description: CEO Evan Spiegel just announced the company is restructuring around small "startup squads" of 10 to 15 people to regain agility against larger competi...

item.title: Intel’s chief executive of products departs among other leadership changes
item.description: Intel also announced the creation of a central engineering group that will build custom chips for outside customers.

item.title: ReOrbit lands record funding to take on Musk’s Starlink from Europe
item.description: Finnish startup ReOrbit, has raised a record €45 million Series A for the country to offer "sovereign" satellites.

item.title: Dyson Promo Codes: 20% Off | September 2025
item.description: Get 20% off with a Dyson coupon code, plus save up to $250 on vacuums, Airwraps, and more.

item.title: OpenAI denies that it’s weighing a ‘last-ditch’ California exit amid regulatory pressure over its restructuring
item.description: OpenAI executives are discussing a potential relocation out of California as increasing political resistance threatens the company's efforts to conver...

item.title: Nepal reverses social media ban as protests turn deadly
item.description: Nepal has reversed its social media ban following nationwide “Gen Z” protests and public backlash.

item.title: 50% Off LG Promo Codes & Coupons
item.description: Save up to 20% with an LG promo code today, plus up to 50% off select appliances for a limited time.
